DOC.brief_summary: Patients consulting in the Allergy Unit of the Arnaud de Villeneuve Hospital for whatever suspicion of allergy were asked to participate in the study. Besides a standard battery of respiratory allergens, native raw and cooked potato were tested by means of the prick to prick method, using a metal lancet.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Allergy to Potato in a Large Cohort
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: patients aged 2 years or older consent obtained from patients or their parents/legal representative Exclusion criteria: refusal to participate in the study antihistamine drugs taken before testing pregnant women vulnerable patients according to French regulation
